page.title: 04LIFESTYLE J.CLARKE BURGHILL
page.content: I get up at 6.30a.m. Leaving for work at 7.00a.m. I work at Jewsons which is a builder supplies yard. I work in the transport office in which I work out loads and journeys for ten lorries to deliver,then I make out the ticket for their deliveries.We have our dinner hour at 12.30p.m. to 1.30p.m.I then work till 5o'clock sometimes, but if I'm busy I come home later. After having tea I do another half hours work on some tickets that I bring home to do. My evenings are spent watching T.V. Once a week I go to darts. I then go to bed at around 10.30p.m., if there is no football on the T.V.
